page.title: 05BROOKLANDS GARAGE,EAST WALL
page.content: This is the only garage in our D.Block it is a filling station with mechanical servicing facilities.We serve all grades of petrol and oils but this is not a money-making service it does bring customers in though.We carry out repairs to all types of vehicles and the customers come from a wide area.We are licenced to do M.O.T. testing,which by law has to be carried out on every three-year old{car}and then every 12 months thereafter.This is a complete {safety}check on the vehicle and if it is not 100% correct the certificate will not be issued and the car cannot be driven until put right.As {petrol}is becoming more expensive,the manufacturers are producing more efficient engines,and more steamlined bodywork.The owner and one assistant mechanic work at the garage.
